SEARCH
Package pegasus.graphics

Interface Triangle<V extends Vector<V>>

Type Parameters:
V - The type of vector used to represent the vertices of this triangle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTriangle, Triangle2D, Triangle3D
public interface Triangle<V extends Vector<V>>
Represents a triangle of arbitrary dimensions.
See Also:
  • Triangle2D
  • Triangle3D

      void replace(UnaryOperator<V> operator)
      Applies the provided update function to each vertex of this triangle, then assigns each vertex of this triangle to the return values of the provided update function.

    • map

      Triangle<V> map(UnaryOperator<V> mapper)
      Applies the provided mapper function to each vertex of this triangle, then returns a new triangle of the return values of the provided mapper function.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The resulting triangle
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided mapper function is null
